Class Category Controller¶

class src.controllers.CategoryController.CategoryController[source]¶

Category controller It’s the main controller for every function related to managing categories and articles

__init__()[source]¶

Init function Creates and returns an instance of CategoryController

Returns:A CategoryController object
__module__ = 'src.controllers.CategoryController'¶
static add_commission(article, commissions)[source]¶

Add commission Given an article and a commission objects, this function can add the commission to the article.

Parameters:
  • article – Current article
  • commissions – List of commission objects
static cat_controller(org, commissions)[source]¶

Cat. controller This method represent the controller that will allow the application to manage categories and articles

Parameters:
  • org – Organization
  • commissions – List of commissions objects
static create_article(category)[source]¶

Create article method This method is responsible of creating articles objects and adding them into the organization via the current category

Parameters:category – Current category
static create_category(org)[source]¶

Create category This fuction is able to create a new category and insert it into the organization’s categories list

Parameters:org – Organization
static list_articles(org)[source]¶

List articles Method responsible of printing all the articles in the organization

Parameters:org – Organization
static list_categories(org)[source]¶

List categories Method responsible of printing all the categories in the organization

Parameters:org – Organization
Returns:
static remove_article(org, a)[source]¶

Remove article This method is able to remove an article from the organization

Parameters:
  • org – Organization
  • a – Current article
static remove_category(org, category)[source]¶

Remove category Method for removing categories from the organization’s categories list

Parameters:
  • org – Organization
  • category – Category to be removed
static remove_commission(article)[source]¶

Remove commission This method removes the commission from article

Parameters:article – Current article
static select_article(org)[source]¶

Select article Allows the user to select an article. The selected article will be the current article until another article is selected

Parameters:org – Organization
Returns:Current article object
static select_category(org)[source]¶

Select category Allows the user to see a list of the current categories and select any category from the previous list

Parameters:org – Organization
Returns:Category object
static select_commission(commissions)[source]¶

Select commission Displays a list of the available commissions and allows the user to select a commission from the list.

Parameters:commissions – List of commission objects
Returns:Commission object
static set_commission(category, commissions)[source]¶

Set commission Given a category and a commission from the list, this method allows the app to set commissions into the category

Parameters:
  • category – Current category
  • commissions – List of commissions objects

Sub-article controller This is the main controller for everything related to articles.

  • commissions – List of commission objects

Subcategory controller Responsible of managing all options related to categories

Unset commission Allows to unset the commission from the category
